long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch Movies Online extension replaces your new tab with online movie streaming search & sponsored web search.


When you install Watch Movies Online, this extension will configure your New Tab to Watch Movies Online with Web Search, Online Movie Streaming options, Current Time/Date, & Custom Web Shortcuts.

How Watch Movies Online works.
Step 1: Search for any movie title by clicking the menu icon at the top right.
Step 2: Our System will then find the best streaming options on the internet.
Step 3: Click Watch Now on any service to stream movie.


Permissions Request
-New Tab
This extension will replace the page you see when opening a new tab with Watch Movies Online

Helpful Links
Privacy:      https://watchmovieonline.net/pages/privacy.html
Uninstall:   https://watchmovieonline.net/pages/uninstall.html
